text: In accordance with our Articles of Association, unless otherwise determined in a general meeting of the Company and subject to the provisions of the Companies Act, 2013 and other applicable rules, the number of Directors of the Company shall not be less than 3 and not more than 15. Our Company currently has 5 Directors on our Board, out of which 2 (Two) are Executive Directors and 2 (Two) are Independent Directors and 1 (One) is Non-Executive Director who is also a woman director.
The following table sets forth the details of our Board as on the date of this Draft Red Herring Prospectus:
